summary: Pasquale Grifone, who lives in Naples with his family, receives in a dream the visit of Dante Alighieri. The poet suggests to the man, clouded by the fumes of alcohol, four numbers to play.
cast: Eduardo De Filippo|Pupella Maggio|Pietro De Vico|Graziella Marina|Nina De Padova|Hilde Maria Renzi|Giuseppe Anatrelli|Enzo Petito|Angela Pagano|Gennarino Palumbo|Pietro Carloni|Enzo Cannavale|Lello Grotta|Maria Colonna|Olga D'Aiello|Anna Langella
title: Sogno di una notte di mezza sbornia
